players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Bob, I think you're the mafioso. You remained silent last night and now it's your turn to speak."
Bob: "I will remain silent. I don't want to give any hints about my role."
Diana: "I don't think Bob is the mafioso, I think Alice might be. She's trying to distract us from herself."

players.name: Diana
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Alice: "Bob, I think you're the mafioso. You remained silent last night and now it's your turn to speak."
Bob: "I will remain silent. I don't want to give any hints about my role."
You: "I don't think Bob is the mafioso, I think Alice might be. She's trying to distract us from herself."
